Thanks for using Yemeksepeti! We update the app as often as possible to make it faster and more reliable for you. The good stuff are the same as before, but now, there is more of them. Here’s what’s new:

1- Bug fixes and performance improvements across the app.

Like it, love it? Rate us or leave a comment! Let us know at info@yemeksepeti.com if you have any suggestions or need help!

Bon appetit!
Bug fixes across the app and performance improvements.

Thanks for using Yemeksepeti! We update the app as often as possible to make it faster and more reliable for you. The good stuff are the same as before, but now, there is more of them. Here’s what’s new:

1- Bug fixes across the app for iOS 11.

Like it, love it? Rate us or leave a comment! Let us know at info@yemeksepeti.com if you have any suggestions or need help!

Bon appetit!

In this release we offer solid UX updates to increase your happiness through each one of your very tasty moments on Yemeksepeti. Here, what stands before you is a long hard work for a faster, resourceful and more helpful app for your food orders.
•Smart Search Module: Yemeksepeti’s new search feature is more like a Discover feature, bringing various cuisine, restaurant and food alternatives, along with users’ favorites based on your search keywords.
•Quicker Ordering: Yemeksepeti App uses your active district to help you order faster, as you can skip address selection via single-page checkout.
•Order Status Display: See the status of your order on the app homepage and the live support page.
•Quick-Peek Restaurant Display: Use Force Touch while you’re on a restaurant listing page and have a quick peek at the most important information about the restaurants.
•Previous Orders Widget: Easily see your Order Status even without opening the app or just repeat your previous order instantly. All you need to do is to add Yemeksepeti App on your Today Extension screen (Just swipe right on iPhone home screen and add us by simply tapping on Edit).
•Updated Interface Design: Easier navigation and more elements of Yemeksepeti experience all present in a bright new design, along with improved accessibility for the visually impaired.
•Yemeksepeti Wallet Top-Ups: Now you can top-up your Yemeksepeti Wallet on your app as well as the website.
•Advanced Live Support: Your chat with our Live Support agents will now go on seamlessly, even if your app is in the background.

In this release we offer solid UX updates to increase your happiness through each one of your very tasty moments on Yemeksepeti. Here, what stands before you is a long hard work for a faster, resourceful and more helpful app for your food orders.
•Smart Search Module: Yemeksepeti’s new search feature is more like a Discover feature, bringing various cuisine, restaurant and food alternatives, along with users’ favorites based on your search keywords.
•Quicker Ordering: Yemeksepeti App uses your active district to help you order faster, as you can skip address selection via single-page checkout.
•Order Status Display: See the status of your order on the app homepage and the live support page.
•Quick-Peek Restaurant Display: Use Force Touch while you’re on a restaurant listing page and have a quick peek at the most important information about the restaurants.
•Previous Orders Widget: Easily see your Order Status even without opening the app or just repeat your previous order instantly. All you need to do is to add Yemeksepeti App on your Today Extension screen (Just swipe right on iPhone home screen and add us by simply tapping on Edit).
•Updated Interface Design: Easier navigation and more elements of Yemeksepeti experience all present in a bright new design, along with improved accessibility for the visually impaired.
•Yemeksepeti Wallet Top-Ups: Now you can top-up your Yemeksepeti Wallet on your app as well as the website.
•Advanced Live Support: Your chat with our Live Support agents will now go on seamlessly, even if your app is in the background.

Also, we fixed a bug where users with long Facebook ID's couldn't login on 32 bit iOS versions.

Bon appetit!

Now, you can also use Yemeksepeti for your grocery shopping. How come? Thanks to Yemeksepeti Banabi. Yemeksepeti Banabi is now in your Yemeksepeti app!

You can switch to Yemeksepeti Banabi, where you can instantly shop for your groceries, by simply tapping on the Banabi icon in the upper right area of Yemeksepeti mobile app homepage. Yemeksepeti Banabi gives you the option to buy any product you need and get them sent to your location straight away within minutes.

You can use Yemeksepeti for your food, dessert and coffee orders, and start using Banabi for groceries, without a new app, a new account, membership form or credit card saving. That is to say: Your Yemeksepeti account = Your Yemeksepeti Banabi account. In addition to all these, promotions, campaigns and discounts will also be available at Yemeksepeti Banabi. Just like in Yemeksepeti.

Download Yemeksepeti app now and have all those you need delivered to your door!

Now, you can also use Yemeksepeti for your grocery shopping. How come? Thanks to Yemeksepeti Banabi. Yemeksepeti Banabi is now in your Yemeksepeti app!
You can switch to Yemeksepeti Banabi, where you can instantly shop for your groceries, by simply tapping on the Banabi icon in the upper right area of Yemeksepeti mobile app homepage. Yemeksepeti Banabi gives you the option to buy any product you need and get them sent to your location straight away within minutes.

You can use Yemeksepeti for your food, dessert and coffee orders, and start using Banabi for groceries, without a new app, a new account, membership form or credit card saving. That is to say: Your Yemeksepeti account = Your Yemeksepeti Banabi account. In addition to all these, promotions, campaigns and discounts will also be available at Yemeksepeti Banabi. Just like in Yemeksepeti.

Download Yemeksepeti app now and have all those you need delivered to your door in the selected cities!

Thanks for using Yemeksepeti!
About Coronavirus Precautions: “Contactless Delivery” is now a prioritized easy-access button on the checkout page for your convenience. We aim to provide you a safer food ordering experience and make you feel better, if we can. Just select Contactless Delivery before you order and pay online. By this way, we can minimize contact and protect each other better.
Rate us or leave a comment! Let us know at info@yemeksepeti.com if you have any suggestions or need help!

Thank you for using Yemeksepeti!

Pick Up option is enabled for your food orders! When you place your Yemeksepeti orders by selecting the Pick Up address in the last step before ordering, you can go to the address of the restaurant and take it. We added a Pick Up filter to the restaurant list so that you can easily find restaurants that offer Pick Up service.

Like it, love it? Rate us or leave a comment! Let us know at info@yemeksepeti.com if you have any suggestions or need help!

This Version’s Menu:
• We've improved our search/restaurant filtering, finding budget-friendly restaurants and users' favorites now is easier than ever.
• We've enabled using multiple campaigns together on Banabi, just because you like them!
• While you search, we’ll remind you your favorite products.
• Furthermore, there’s some accessibility throughout the app.
We love hearing from you, so please rate/review us on the store.
Enjoy your meals and groceries!

This Version's Special:
• In case your order with online credit card payment gets canceled somehow, we now return the payment to your Wallet account only in minutes! All you need to do is to select this option on the pop-up screen that appears.
We love hearing from you, so please rate/review us on the store.
Enjoy your meals and groceries!

Yummy Updates in this New Version:

Good news for those who like to stick to the usuals: Automatic Favorites feature is on! The restaurants that you order frequently are now automatically added to your favorites. Do not forget to take a look at your Favorites tab.

We love hearing from you, so please rate/review us on the store.
Enjoy your meals and groceries!
